## Written response question

What control should the board have over the ability of nonprofit executives to spend funds to accomplish organizational objectives? Should nonprofit executives have flexibility to adjust their budgets in response to new conditions without obtaining board approval? (Answer in â‰ˆ150 words.)


## Team prep work

Put together a basic, preliminary, balanced budget for your nonprofit to propose to your team. You'll spend class time creating and finalizing your organization's budget.
